Firmware installation

To install the DPT-Board firmware you must follow these steps:

  1. Download the file 'openwrt-ar71xx-generic-dpt-module-squashfs-factory.bin' from http://firmware.dptechnics.com/dptv1/. Choose any software version you want, the latest version is recommended.
  2. Select the file you just downloaded.
  3. Press the Restore firmware button and wait for your device to boot again.
WARNINGS
  • Do not power off the device during update, this may break your device.
  • The DPT-Board will restart after the installation is finished.
  • Make sure to upload the correct firmware file, a wrong file may break your device.
